title: Engraved guitar inlay
content:
This inlay is a take on Woody Guthrie's "This Machine Kills Fascists." Here is the mother of pearl before we set it in the guitar:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104190648im_/http:/typophile.com/files/woody2_6579.jpg)

More pictures and a story about the construction can be found on my [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104190648/http:/www.alembic.com/info/fc_woody.html). We used Storm's Solpera as the basis. Even though the single line engraving didn't exactly mimic his design, I quite think the character of the font was preserved.
author: mica
